More on Casper (CSPR)

Casper, developed by CasperLabs and launched in 2021, is a public Proof of Stake blockchain designed to address limitations in existing Layer 1 chains and promote broader blockchain adoption. Utilizing the CBC-Casper consensus protocol focuses on decentralization, security, and scalability. The native token, CSPR, plays a crucial role in network security, validator rewards, transaction facilitation, and value transfer. Additionally, CSPR empowers its holders with governance capabilities, allowing them to participate in decision-making for protocol upgrades and network enhancements.

You can find more information about the project in our “What is Casper” article.

Log in to your Bitstamp account to start trading and get the Bitstamp mobile apps (Bitstamp on App Store or Google Play; Bitstamp Pro on App Store or Google Play) to trade all our cryptocurrencies on the go!
